feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
